word:
"Make Me a Healthy, Fruit-bearing Branch" 


     June 29, 1892. My prayer on awaking is, Jesus, keep Thy child today. Take me under Thy guardianship. Make 
                                                                           238
me a healthy, fruit-bearing branch of the living Vine. "Without me," Christ says, "ye can do nothing" (John 15:5). In and through Christ we can do all things.
